nodes.text: Last Call at Leatherback's is a standalone roleplaying adventure published by Wizards of the Coast. The adventure was written by Cory Herndon and is aimed at a party of four adventurers at level 3. The adventure was later referenced in 2008's The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia. It lets players experience the Invasion of Sriluur.

Various individuals are present in Leatherback's, a cantina on the planet Sriluur when it is invaded by the Yuuzhan Vong. Four of these individuals find a small group of droids being herded down the street by a group of Peace Brigadiers and intervene to help the Rodian owner of the droids. The Rodian, Falloon offers to pay them if they will help him get the droids offworld.

Together the group fights their way to Falloon's starship, the Gilded Thranta, encountering Chazrach and Yuuzhan Vong along the way. Finally, they escape the planet, evading coralskippers and fleeing to Coruscant.
